underlying_goal: To perform several repository updates: migrate the project from npm/yarn to Bun, add a new blog post, configure Netlify deployment, and add a status badge to the README.
primary_success: Claude correctly identified and handled multiple logically separate changes within a single work tree, creating distinct, well-messaged commits for each.
brief_summary: The user tasked Claude with several updates, including migrating to Bun, adding a blog post, and setting up Netlify. Claude added a Netlify badge to the README and then logically separated the work into distinct commits.
